name: puri
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(in Indian cooking) a small round piece of bread that is deep-fried (= fried in a deep pan of oil) and served with meat or vegetables: Deep-fry the puris until they are golden brown. I love poori, which swells like a balloon when it is fried in hot oil.
More examplesFewer examplesPlace the prepared puris in the fridge before frying them; they will consume less oil and will be crisper.For breakfast, we were offered a choice between an omelette or a deep-fried puffed bread, called poori.While the meat was simmering, they ate puris and spiced potatoes.You can flavour pooris with various spices.
